author: arkurth
msg: Added Linux.pm::set_file_permissions subroutine.  This will be called from VMware.pm after an image is copied to the image repository to set the correct permissions.  VMware's methods set the permissions to 0700 when a virtual disk is copied.  This prevents image retrieval from working.
Also added -f to the rm command in delete_file.

author: elecharny
msg: Fix the DN for passwordPolicy ATs and OCs

author: elecharny
msg: o Added the SchemaManager into the System partition instance
o Avoid a call to the testEntries loader if it's null

author: oheger
msg: [CONFIGURATION-424] Fixed a bug in the handling of the global section in HierarchicalINIConfiguration.
